Improvements.Improvement: Extract repeated code into a separate method
Improvements.Description: The process of retrieving SteamID from `remoteUserIDs` or `friends` based on a given ID is repeated twice in the method. You can create a new method `getSteamID(int id)` that encapsulates this logic to avoid code duplication and improve maintainability.

There are several string constants used in the method. It's a good practice to define such constants as static final variables at the class level. This will make the code more readable and maintainable.
